text:
......
To tell the truth... it still feels...

I see...
Even after the performance, the dream didn't end.

Yes...
The secret base... was dismantled, but...

Rinze seemed so happy...
And worked so hard.

They even said she was number one.
...Could one work so hard in a dream?

Hehe...
When you put it that way...

Lived without knowing...
What it means to achieve something together...

Yes...
Meeting people...
Whom I can call friends...

Training together...
Laughing together every day...

If this...
Is what reality is...

Reality...
Is a world that surpasses even dreams...

Hehe...
I'm feeling a bit excited...
